name: If you stop (your heart), you die
name_original: If you stop (your heart), you die
description:
Made for the  GameDev Insiders Jam #1 game jam.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move left and right
  • Space bar - Defy gravity (aka jump)
  • E - Have a good ol' chat
  • Left ctrl - Stop your heart

Overview:

Snoop through your master's magical castle while he's off on errands and discover how creepy the afterlife is!

You're not supposed to touch anything, but maybe a look won't hurt... right? Explore the Land of the Dead and admire beautiful artworks, all while worrying about a demon that's going to get you in trouble.

Credits:

Art/animation/programming: Alexander Byatt
Music and SFX: Richard Jeffrey
Special thanks to LetterAfterZ, Bek and Damian
